info.name: Yousign Documentation
info.description:
## ðŸ‘‹ Introduction

The Yousign API is designed to provide a collaborative environment for developers to thoroughly discover it.

This collection can help you perform various tests for your APIs, i.e in Sandbox or Production env.

## ðŸš€ Getting started with this collection

You can send individual requests in this collection and take advantage of auto-set variables value when executing your requests, so you can forget about IDs from one request to another.

Don't hesitate to use dedicated environment as well (Sandbox / Production).

## ðŸ›Ÿ Help and support

If you have any questions or suggestions, please don't hesitate to check [the documentation](https://developers.yousign.com/docs/introduction-new).

body.raw:
{
  "background_color": "{{$randomHexColor}}",
  "button_color": "{{$randomHexColor}}",
  "disabled_notifications": [
    "approver.expiration_date_reminder",
    "approver.canceled",
    "approver.expiration_date_updated",
    "follower.approved",
    "follower.canceled",
    "follower.completed",
    "follower.expired",
    "follower.rejected",
    "follower.signed",
    "sender.approved",
    "sender.canceled",
    "sender.completed",
    "sender.rejected",
    "sender.signed",
    "signer.expiration_date_reminder",
    "signer.canceled",
    "signer.completed",
    "signer.signed",
    "signer.expiration_date_updated"
  ],
  "email_expiration_text_disabled": true,
  "email_footer_signature_disabled": true,
  "email_header_text_disabled": false,
  "email_logo_disabled": true,
  "landing_page_disabled": true,
  "name": "CX {{$randomBsBuzz}}",
  "redirect_urls": {
    "decline": "https://www.example.com/decline",
    "error": "https://www.example.com/error",
    "success": "https://www.example.com/success"
  },
  "side_panel_disabled": false,
  "text_button_color": "{{$randomHexColor}}",
  "text_color": "{{$randomHexColor}}"
}
